name: Cozy Lullaby
description:
Click on Run Game to start!

Help Sasha rebuild her torn up island with the power of music !

  • Featuring fully hand drawn assets and a coloring-book feel!
  • The game's soundtrack changes with your game experience.
  • You play as a cute frog, and that's pretty cool.

Sadly our first build failed. Please play the latest version for a better experience!

Controls :

WASD/ZQSD to move, Right Click to interact.

Credits :

  • Fred : programming, game design; level design and shader programming.
  • Ritsu : 2D props, animation (notes) and CG Art.
  • Topaze : Background Art, 2D props, UI and game logo.
  • Rini : 2D props, character animation and design, CG Art, music composition and SFX.
